content: प्रदा {c3c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To grant, give, offer. present; स्वं प्रागह प्रादिषि नामराय किं नाम तस्मै मनसा नराय <ls>N. 6. 95</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 99</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 3.">108</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 3.">273</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 90.</ls> {@--2@} To impart, teach (as learning); <ls>Bh. 2. 15</ls> {@--3@} To give, give away; yield. {@--4@} To give up, deliver. {@--5@} To give away in marriage. {@--6@} To sell; <ls>Pt. 1. 13.</ls> {@--7@} To deliver up, restore.
